member.summary: The Encoding class used for creating and decoding the Mime Messages used by aspNetPOP3.

member.name: P:aspNetPOP3.POP3.InboxSize
member.summary: The size of the Inbox in bytes. PopulateInboxStats() must be called for this property to be populated.

member.name: P:aspNetPOP3.POP3.InboxMessageCount
member.summary: The number of messages in the Inbox. PopulateInboxStats() must be called for this property to be populated.

member.summary: The password used for logging into the POP3 server.

member.summary: Port for connecting to the server. By default Port is set to 110.

member.summary: Creates an instance of a proxy server object.

member.name: P:aspNetPOP3.POP3.ResponseEncoding
member.summary: The Encoding used to encode POP3 commands issued against the servers, to a byte array of data.

member.name: P:aspNetPOP3.POP3.RequestEncoding
member.summary: The Encoding used to decode POP3 responses from bytes to text.
